execution_plan.description: Compute the number of members per chat (member counts) from the chat_members table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT chat_id, COUNT(*) AS member_count FROM chat_members GROUP BY chat_id;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve chat details (id, name, description, created_at) for the chats returned in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS chat_id, name, description, created_at FROM chats WHERE id IN ($step1.chat_id);
